definitions.definition: An ancient Semitic Akkadian kingdom and at times an empire , extant from the mid-23rd century BCE to 608 BCE and centred on the Upper Tigris river in northern Mesopotamia (present day northern Iraq , but at its maximum extent including parts of modern Iran , Syria , Israel , Palestine and Egypt ).

main_definition: ( historical ) An ancient Semitic Akkadian kingdom and at times an empire , extant from the mid-23rd century BCE to 608 BCE and centred on the Upper Tigris river in northern Mesopotamia (present day northern Iraq , but at its maximum extent including parts of modern Iran , Syria , Israel , Palestine and Egypt ).
